overview:
Online advertising, technology and media innovator. Is currently, Head of Business Development, North America for InMobi. Digital media consultant for several Private Equity groups, VC’s, Brands, Media Publishers and Start-ups. Previously was Executive Vice President for Corporate and Business Development at Mixercast where he helped develop a rich-media publishing platform that generated over a Billion monthly engagements. He created Master Service Agreements for top-tier Creative and Digital Agencies including; BBH, DDB, Digitas, Deutsch, DraftFCB and Universal McCann among others. He has partnered with top 100 brands and media companies including; Nike, Puma, McDonalds, Intel, Best Buy, Universal, CBS, and Nokia among others, to innovate their digital strategies and increase their consumer engagement.

He was Co-founder and CEO of Digital Citizen, where he developed the technology and royalty licenses for the first legal, free, on-demand ad-supported digital music service sanctioned by the top four music-label groups and publishers, helping create the structure that is now the industry standard for online ad-supported music services.

He has generated over $150MM in revenue and fund raising for the various companies he has worked with and founded. Has also developed and holds several patents for numerous web-based technologies.

Archie advises on several Boards and is a regular lecturer at universities and industry panels. He was an A&R Director for PolyGram Music Publishing; a producer of both multi-platinum major-label and independent artists; was a voting member of the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences (the Grammyâ€™s).

He is the Publisher of the literary arts journal, Unsaid.
